data.title: Movie: 'The 19th Wife'
data.meta_description:
9 tonight
LIFETIME
Patricia Wettig (right) stars as a woman suspected of murdering her polygamist husband. Another wife asks her excommunicated son (Matt Czuchry) to help clear his mother's name. Adapted from David Ebershoff's novel.
data.text:
9 tonight

LIFETIME

Patricia Wettig (right) stars as a woman suspected of murdering her polygamist husband. Another wife asks her excommunicated son (Matt Czuchry) to help clear his mother's name. Adapted from David Ebershoff's novel.
